summary: PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) is a big British company that offers business and financial services all around the world. It's one of the top four largest accounting firms. PwC has lots of offices in many countries, with thousands of employees. They offer different services like checking financial reports (assurance), tax advice, and business consulting. The company was formed in 1998 when two old accounting firms merged. Recently, PwC has had some problems because they were involved in illegal activities like helping people avoid paying taxes and not following auditing rules.
title: PwC
